Membership.title: How to be a Membership?
Membership.description: When you buy a Web3 Together NFT Membership Pass, you’re not simply buying an NFT. You will gain membership access to a Web3 Together Membership Pass: Genesis Edition whose benefits and offerings will increase over time. Web3 Together pass supply will be limited to 3333.

title.main: Use NFT Rewards to Power Loyalty
title.sub: NFTs: A New Way to Reward Members

Rewards.description: NFTs are quickly emerging as a new form of rewards for loyalty members. Brands are reaching new customers, building a new wave of excitement, and creating new communities of super fans. Now, you can offer NFT rewards at nearly every touchpoint. With Annex Cloud, you can add NFT rewards – with or without gamification – and create an entirely new kind of experience for your members.

one.title: Out Talking Event
one.description: If you hold 1 Web3 Together Membership Pass = 1 Free NFT in Each NFT Project launched by 99xclub team. Minimum 12 NFT projects will be launched by 99xclub team in span of 3 years.

one.question: How to mint 99x Club NFT Pass?
one.answer: There will be 3333 99x Club NFT Passes available. Whitelist Mint Price will be 0.1 ETH per pass. Whitelist Mint Date : 20 Feb-23 13:30 UTC. Mint Link will be updated on httos://99x.club
